definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: variant of [[לַיִשׁ]] (whence We:De gent 37) Di rd. [[לֵשָׁם]]; Lag:BN 20 Anm. thinks [[ם]] remnant of Mimmation, [[לֶשֶׁם]] fr. [[לַיִשׁ]] = Laisûum), old, name of city [[דָּן]] (v. [[לַיִשׁ]]), Jos 19:47, Jos 19:47 (cf. Di), LXXB Laxeiv, [[לֶשֶׁם דָּן]] = Lasenndak, ALXXL Lesen.
